Description:
Weâ€™re excited to share that weâ€™ve entered a new chapter in how we bring you Azure AI content! To streamline your experience, several Azure AI Tech Community blogs have been consolidated into a single destinationâ€”the ***[Azure AI Foundry Blog](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/category/azure-ai-foundry)***.

## Whatâ€™s Changed

**Multiple Azure AI blogs have merged into one.** The Azure AI technical blogs â€“ including the **AI Platform Blog**, **Azure AI Services Blog**, and **Azure Machine Learning Blog** â€“ are now part of the new [**Azure AI Foundry Blog**](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/category/azure-ai-foundry). By consolidating these resources into a single blog, you have one place to find technical news, tutorials, and announcements.

## Seamless Access to Past Content

**All existing content has been preserved.** Posts from the legacy blogs have been **migrated into the** [**Azure AI Foundry Blog**](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/category/azure-ai-foundry)archive. Older posts remain accessible through redirects, so your **bookmarks and saved links still work**â€”theyâ€™ll simply take you to their new location.

Original blog sites now forward to the [Azure AI Foundry Blog](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/category/azure-ai-foundry) homepage, ensuring a smooth transition for our community.

## Stay Connected: Update Your Subscription

Email/RSS subscriptions from legacy blogs **did not carry over** to the new blog, meaning current followers and subscribers of the AI Platform, Azure AI Services, and Machine Learning blogs were **not automatically moved** to the Azure AI Foundry Blog. To continue receiving the latest Azure AI updates, **please re-subscribe to the** [**Azure AI Foundry Blog**](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/category/azure-ai-foundry). We recommend doing this to avoid missing any new posts.

We apologize for the inconvenience, but this one-time re-subscription will ensure you stay informed about Azure AI innovations going forward, in one consolidated feed

ðŸ“¢Subscribe via the Follow button on Azure AI Foundry Blog homepage

## Looking Ahead

Weâ€™re just getting started. Consolidating our blogs into the Azure AI Foundry Blog is a key step toward delivering a more unified, insightful experience, giving you a clearer view of how our tools, services, and innovations work together to power real-world solutions. **We appreciate your readership and support during this transition.**

### Additional Resources

Check out these additional resources for more Azure AI content:

- [Azure Blog](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/)
- [DevBlogs](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/foundry/)
- Stay engaged with the Azure AI community on [Discord](https://discord.gg/azureaifoundry) and [GitHub](https://github.com/resources/articles)

Thank you for being part of our journey. We look forward to building whatâ€™s nextâ€”together.
Author: GalimahB
